name: Ouchi de Mugen Puchi Puchi
overview: With the sound and vibration of the Wii remote control as if the real "bubble wrap" was crushed, the healing effect is outstanding! For each stage, such as "Fart Petit" or "Namco Old Game Petit", there are about 40 types of interesting stages with different illustrations and sounds! With a simple stress diagnosis, we provide a stage that fits the mood at that time. In addition, you can enjoy how to crush full of exhilaration, such as "squeeze" which collapses collectively, "chain" which occurs when crushing by rhythm.
